text:
-nava# rundhEq catu#ScatvAri(gm)Sataqmanu# brUyAdindriqyakA#masyaq catu#ScatvAri(gm)SadakSharA triqShTugi#ndriqyaM triqShTup triqShTuBaiqvAsmA# indriqyamava# rundhEq &ShTAca#tvAri(gm) Sataqmanu# brUyAt paqSukA#masyAqShTAca#tvAri(gm)SadakSharAq jaga#tIq jAga#tAH paqSavOqjaga#tyaiqvAsmai# paqSUnava# rundhEq sarvA#Niq CandAq(gg)q syanu# brUyAd-bahuyAqjinaqH sarvA#Niq vA Eqtasyaq CandAq(gg)qsya va#ruddhAniq yO ba#huyAqjyapa#rimitaqmanu# brUyAqdapa#rimitaqsyA va#rudhyai || 60
(kAqmayE#taq - prati#ShThityai - paqSUnth - saqptaca#tvAri(gm)Sacca) (A10)
